summary: Adds a vampire hood into the game just like seranas that protects you from the sun and completes the vampire set allowing you to gain from the light armor matching set perk. The level of protection from the hood changes as you progess through your vampric stages. this mod is also fully compatible with Better Vampires by Brehanin.
descriptionHtml:
Royal Vampire Hood 1.3
by: AncientVampire and Khrada

Final Version is out any updates will be optional
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:

The Royal Vampire Hood is a lore friendly mod that provides you protection from the Sun and completes the Vampire Armor Set in the game allowing you to benefit from the light armor matching set perk. The level of protection that this hood offers is dependent upon your vampric stage. When your vampire is fully fed you have the best level of protection while wearing the hood. You also have the option of choosing between the Vampire Armor or Vampire Royal armor to recieve the benefits from the matching set perk. This mod is fully compatible with Better Vampires by Brehanin. And allows your charachter a new ingame experience to go out in the sun by equiping a hood like serana does.
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Update 1.3: 
- As your vampire stages change the level of protection changes as well
- Now allows you to gain 100% regeneration in sunlight if you are fully fed.
- The protection level is now shown at the top of the active effects menu & no longer in red.
- Updated all the descriptions and text within the mod.

Update 1.2: 
-Minor text changes and now fully compatible with Better Vampires by Brehanin

Update 1.1: 
- matching set perk now works with all vampire armors so you can choose from Vampire Armor or Vampire Royal Armor. 
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Features:

- A new light armor hood that uses the mesh from seranas hood
- Completes the vampire armor set so you can bennefit from the light amor matching set perk. 
- Detects Sun Damage level and provides you with protection
- Protection Adjusts as your Vampire Stage changes
- Compatibility with Better Vampires by Brehanin
_________________________________________________________________________________________

My Recommended mods to use with this one for the best Vampire Experience:

Better Vampires by: Brehanin
Royal Bloodline - Vampire Lord perk tree - abilities - and more by: xyks
Vampire Lord Retexture by: Dr Fring
Vampire Lord Collision Fix by: Mercurius85
_________________________________________________________________________________________

How to get:

Once your a vampire you can craft this item at any forge with 20 leather
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Vampire Royal Hood\'s Protection to Sunlight Stages:

Stage 1: 
- Protected by your hood, Health, Magica, and stamina have retained 100% of its recovery rate while in sunlight and are reduced by 5 points

Stage 2:
- Protected by your hood, Health, Magica, and stamina have retained 75% of its recovery rate while in sunlight and are reduced by 10 points

Stage 3:
- Protected by your hood, Health, Magica, and stamina have retained 50% of its recovery rate while in sunlight and are reduced by 15 points
 
Stage 4:
- Protected by your hood, Health, Magica, and stamina have retained 25% of its recovery rate while in sunlight and are reduced by 20 points
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Requirements:

Skyrim, Make sure your game is up to date! (1.8.151.0.7 when the mod is created)
Dawnguard DLC
_________________________________________________________________________________________

Compatibility:

This mod is now fully compatible with 	
Better Vampires by Brehanin
and should work with all other non related vampire mods
